matrix.db
Class WideString

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.WideString
public class WideString
extends java.lang.Object

The WideString class is an encapsulation of support for double-byte strings received from and sent to the Business Object Server. This class automatically handles encryption/decryption of strings.
